description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Testing a few security cameras shouldn't be hard, right? Something about sitting in a chair watching as two strangely dressed intruders attempt to break into a home doesn't sound appealing. This incredibly scary game makes for an entertaining, albeit frightening experience.
